content: Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents

comment.text: When merging two folders into one, this description indicates that all contents will be combined, appearing on a merge options screen in a conflict resolve dialog.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İki qovluq bütün məzmunu ilə bir qovluğa birləşdiriləcək' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İki qovluq birləşdirilərək, bütün məzmunu ilə bir qovluq əldə ediləcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Δύο φάκελοι θα συγχωνευθούν σε έναν με όλα τα περιεχόμενα' is a literal translation but could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Greek. 'περιεχόμενα' while technically correct, feels slightly formal and less common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Δύο φάκελοι θα συγχωνευθούν σε έναν, συμπεριλαμβάνοντας όλα τα αρχεία και τους φακέλους.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Երկու թղթապանակ կմիավորվեն մեկի մեջ, ամբողջ բովանդակությամբ' doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents'. 'ամբողջ բովանդակությամբ' is a literal translation of 'with all the contents' and sounds unnatural in Armenian.  A better phrasing would convey the inclusion of all the contents more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Երկու թղթապանակները կմիավորվեն մեկի մեջ, բոլորովին բոլոր բովանդակություններով։ (Two folders will be merged into one, including all of their contents.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb conjugation 'կմիավորվեն' is grammatically correct, but the sentence structure could be improved for better flow. Using a more active voice or a different sentence structure would read more naturally in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մեկ թղթապանակի մեջ կմիավորվեն երկու թղթապանակ, բոլորովին բոլոր բովանդակություններով։ (Two folders will be merged into one, including all of their contents.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents' is slightly verbose. The Japanese translation, while technically correct, loses some of the efficiency and natural flow. A more natural translation might emphasize the merging *of* the folders, rather than the result.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 2 つのフォルダが結合され、すべての内容を含む 1 つのフォルダになります (2 tsuno foruda ga ketsugou sare, subete no naiyou o fukumu 1 tsuno foruda ni narimasu).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "두 폴더가 모든 내용을 포함하는 하나의 폴더로 병합됩니다" while technically correct, is a bit wordy and could be more concise. '포함하는' (including) is somewhat redundant given the context of merging folders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 두 폴더가 하나의 폴더로 병합됩니다 (Two folders will be merged into one).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ສອງໂຟນເດີຈະຖືກລວບລ່ຽງເຂົ້າກັນເປັນສູງສຸດດ້ວຍເນື້ອໃນທັງໝົດ' is not a perfect translation of 'Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents'. 'ເປັນສູງສຸດ' (pen sung sut) translates to 'to the highest' or 'to the utmost', which doesn't fit the context of folder merging.  It implies merging into the 'most' of something, which is nonsensical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສອງໂຟນເດີຈະຖືກລວບລ່ຽງເຂົ້າກັນດ້ວຍເນື້ອໃນທັງໝົດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Divas mapes tiks apvienotas vienā ar visu saturu' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Latvian. A more idiomatic translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Divas mapes tiks apvienotas vienā, iekļaujot visu saturu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "z całą zawartością" (with all the contents) is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Polish. It's better to convey the meaning of 'all contents being included' without being so verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dwa katalogi zostaną połączone w jeden, z uwzględnieniem całej zawartości.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'merged' is better translated as 'unite' or 'combinate' rather than 'îmbinate'. 'Îmbinate' implies joining two things, often irregularly or with some difficulty, which isn't the intended meaning here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Două foldere vor fi unite într-un singur folder cu tot conținutul

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "තවදුරටත්, ෆෝල්ඩර් දෙකක් එකකට ඒකාග්‍ර කරනු ලැබේ, එහි සියලුම අන්තර්ගතයන් ඇතුළත් වේ." is overly verbose and not a natural way to express the concept of merging folders. 'තවදුරටත්' (Thavaduratath) which translates to 'furthermore' or 'in addition' is unnecessary and creates an awkward phrasing. The inclusion of 'ඇතුළත් වේ' (Athulatha We) which translates to 'included' is also redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ෆෝල්ඩර් දෙකක් එකකට ඒකාග්‍ර කරනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly convoluted and could be simplified for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ෆෝල්ඩර් දෙකක් එකකට ඒකාග්‍ර කරනු ලැබේ, සියලුම අන්තර්ගතයන්හි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фолдера' is a colloquial/informal spelling of 'фолдери'. While understandable, 'фолдери' is the more standard and preferred form in most contexts.
The English phrase 'with all the contents' is not perfectly captured by 'sa svim sadržajem'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the merging of all items within the folders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dva foldera će biti spojena u jedan, uz preuzimanje svih datoteka i sadržaja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İki klasör tüm içerikleriyle bir klasörde birleştirilecek' is not a perfect equivalent of 'Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents'. A more natural translation would be something like 'İki klasör, tüm içerikleriyle tek bir klasörde birleştirilecektir.' or 'İki klasörün tüm içerikleri tek bir klasörde birleştirilecek'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İki klasörün tüm içerikleri tek bir klasörde birleştirilecek

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian sentence "Дві папки буде об'єднано в одну з усім вмістом" uses the passive voice and sounds awkward in Ukrainian.  A more natural phrasing would use an active voice construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Дві папки буде об'єднано в одну з усім вмістом.  Better: Об'єднаються дві папки в одну з усім вмістом (Two folders will be merged into one with all the contents).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '涵盖全部内容' (han gai quanbu neirong) is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally as it could. '涵盖' implies covering or including, which isn't the best fit for 'with all the contents'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 两个文件夹将合并为一个文件夹，包含所有内容 (Liangge fu文件夹 jiang hebing wei yigge fu文件夹，baohao suoyou neirong)
